name: ESCape (itch) (ioi)
description:
ESCape is a 3D third-person stealth game with puzzle elements built with Unreal Engine 4 and made as an entry for #GameZanga 7 gamejam

Plot:

On a distant planet, in an artificial intelligence (AI) facility manufacturing machines programmed to kill humans on earth, Naya, a machine with a glitch that prevents it from killing humans, tries to escape before getting destroyed....

Please let me know in the comments below what you think about ESCape and provide feedback

The game is still in development so feel free to report any bugs in the comments if you feel like it : )
